infos.value: That is quite a clamor coming from the castle...
My, you are a perceptive one.
Glaciela and «Rubeus» began their siege at dawn's first light.
How can this be? I was told that it had been postponed.
Lord Mont and the others were supposed to be on their way to rescue Lady Machérie from Leonis Castle...
Yes, you have it right.
Then why would Lady Glaciela still...? Are you not her ally?
Glaciela and I are dear friends.
Then why would you not inform her!?
Do you think she would listen even if I did advise her?
But without Leonis's aid, the chance of «Rubeus» alone claiming victory is...
Nothing would change. Even if Leonis's forces were here.
What...?
Perhaps you are underestimating Khury a bit, no?
The way I see it, even if Leonis's troops joined forces with Glaciela and «Rubeus», Khury could not be felled.
Then what can be done to defeat him?
If Glaciela were to die...Khury would believe that the threat against him has been squelched, would he not?
Y-you heartless...!
Please do not misunderstand.
Glaciela has been my friend since childhood. I could not possibly wish for her death.
However...if that were the only way to put an end to Khury...I would not hesitate.
We must be willing to go to such lengths if we are to have any hope of striking down a man such as he.
But how can you just throw away a lifelong friend…?
If I were the one to take down Khury, I would not expect to leave the battlefield alive.
...It seems as though «Rubeus» has broken through the castle gates.
Now, then...
I wonder what Glaciela will do once she realizes Mont is not here.
It would be best if she retreated, but alas...
Follow me!
